channel.title: Android Humble Bundle
channel.description:
Hey guys, for those of you with Android phones, a new Humble Bundle is out. [url]https://www.humblebundle.com[/url].
Just downloading them now, I love all these games, it'll be pretty cool to have them on the go.
Also, I already have the Steam Keys for these games so PM me if you want to trade something for the four games in the bundle on Steam. When you buy the Android apps you get Steam keys for them all again, so I have extras

awesome!
